Credentialing

Getting contracted with payers quickly is critical to get cash flow positive. Our credentialing experts can navigate the often confusing contracting process.

NPI Registration

If you have not gotten a NPI for your entity, that is the very first step. We are able to register and get your organization an NPI number fairly quickly.

Medicare & Medicaid

After NPI registration, we start Medicare and Medicaid credentialing at no additional cost. Medicare and Medicaid can be tricky at times and using a team with substantial experience with these two payers can help get them completed quickly.

CAQH

CAQH is a centralized credentialing database that is used by many payors. We create a CAQH profile for each provider in your group and will maintain it for your organization.

IPA coordination

In certain markets, it makes sense to work with an Independent Physician Association (IPA) instead of credentialing individually. They can often speed up the credentialing process by months and can sometimes get better rates. We will coordinate activities with your IPA to ensure credentialing is on schedule and that you and our billing team are kept abreast of the progress.

“Three months after starting credentialing, I realized my applications were not even submitted. Primrose came in, took control of the entire process and we never looked back. An up to date payor grid, weekly check-in meeting, an organized process saw us through. I would not have lost revenue if I had started Primrose from the very beginning.”

Dr. Makinde
Director | Covenant Women's Health, Texas

Commercial contracting

Once a decision whether to use IPA or not is made, we identify the top 15 payors in your market and start the contracting process with any payor not covered by the IPA. Commercial credentialing may incur additional costs.

Coordinated billing

Knowing when to hold a claim and when to file can make all the difference between getting paid or getting processed out-of-network. Our credentialing team works hand-in-hand with the billing department to file claims to maximize your collection.

Weekly meetings

Transition plan is established at the start of the onboarding process. We do weekly meetings with clients during the implementation phase to go over the transition plan and fix any issues.

Primrose is here to help you all the way

Our mission is simple: to enable the success of your practice. From day one, we make it easy to get up and running with Primrose. Once onboarded, our support team is ready to make sure that your success continues. Free for Primrose customers.

  • Dedicated team member for personalized services
